name: Long Way
description:
Long Way is an arcade driving simulator that offers an interesting driving experience of various types of vehicles. Players have the opportunity to choose from a variety of vehicles, including sedans, Muscle cars, armored personnel carriers and semi-trailers, each with its own unique driving mechanics and tasks.

The game also offers extensive car modification options, allowing players to customize their vehicles by changing paint, adding new wheels. This adds a level of personalization to the game, giving players the freedom to customize their vehicles to their liking.



In addition to various types of vehicles and customization options, the game offers a relatively realistic experience of driving a heavy truck complete with trailers with which players must maneuver through various landscapes and obstacles. The game also features various types of weather conditions, including summer, winter, blizzard, snow and rain, which affect the handling of vehicles.

The graphics and visual effects of the game are impressive, with realistic clouds and dynamic time of day, which enhances the immersion effect. The game includes various levels, each with unique challenges that players must overcome, which makes the game fun and exciting.



Overall, this game offers a rich driving experience thanks to different vehicles, car customization, as well as dynamic weather and lighting effects. Players will enjoy the challenges and rewards that come with completing each level, which makes this game fun and entertaining.



The game also has support for a multiplayer game where you can play together with your friends and have a lot of fun! You can invite up to 8 friends to join you in an exciting adventure.
